title: Super resolution of videos
desc: ML based tool to upscale videos for users in low bandwidth regions. Used image resolution techniques and CNNs to upscale videos. Won the 1st prize of Akamai global hackathon across 10+ regions in 2019.

title: MusicAI Assistant
desc: An ML based piano assistant that could complement a user's melody by playing complementing bass harmonies in realtime. Techniques involved using variations of Logistic Regression, KNN, LSTMs, Hidden Markov Models, etc to predict a chord to be played based on the melody input.

title: Genre classification based on lyrics
desc: An ML based genre classifier based on the lyrics of a song. Used NLP techniques to extract features from the lyrics and then used ML techniques to classify the genre of the song. Generated the dataset by scraping lyrics from a public website which tags songs to its genres.
